Class DonorDCOptions

java.lang.Object
DonorDCOptions
public class DonorDCOptions extends Object
This is a class that contains all the methods to be used within the DonorDC class

  • Constructor Details

    • DonorDCOptions

      public DonorDCOptions()

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      protected static void changePassword(Donor user)
      This changes the password of the current user logged in. The user will first be asked to input their current password, and then the new password of their choice. The purpose of asking the user for their current password is to verify the user beforehand and add another layer of protection to their data.
      Parameters:
      user - the user logged in who's password will be changed

    • changephoneNumber

      protected static void changephoneNumber(Donor user)
      This changes the manpower of the current user logged in. The user will be asked to input their desired manpower. Should the number be invalid, they will receive an error message.
      Parameters:
      user - the user logged in who's phone number will be changed

    • deleteAccount

      public static boolean deleteAccount(Donor user)
      This deletes the account and data of the current donor logged in. The donor account will be wiped from the file and all of their related aids will also be deleted.
      Parameters:
      user - the account to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the account was deleted, false otherwise

    • inputAids

      protected static void inputAids(Donor user)
      The user is able to input the aids that they wish to donate. The method automatically converts aids entered to a String with proper formatting and capitalisation. If the user inputs an invalid number, they will be prompted to input a correct number before they are able to exit the method. The user's request for aids will then be written in a file of all the aids needed.
      Parameters:
      user - the user logged in who will be donating the aids

    • DonorIDFilter

      protected static Donor DonorIDFilter()
      The user will be asked to input the desired Donor of their choice. Returns the Donor Account of the user's choosing. If the account does not exist, the user will be asked for more input until the correct input is received.
      Returns:
      Donor Account of the user's choice.

    • printAidsList

      protected static void printAidsList(ArrayList<String> list)
      This will print the aid's list consisting a donor, the aids donated, and the NGO receiving them
      Parameters:
      list - the list to be out put by the method

    • printAidsNeeded

      protected static void printAidsNeeded(ArrayList<String> list)
      This will print the list of all the aids donated by a Donor
      Parameters:
      list - the list to be printed out by the method
